actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating segments of certain rivers in the State of Colorado for study as potential components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Colorado Rivers Preservation Act - Designates, under the provisions of the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act, specified segments of certain rivers in the State of Colorado for study as potential components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System. Authorizes the appropriation of up to $2,250,000 to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating segments of certain rivers in the State of Colorado for study as potential components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
